creditline: Gift of Al and Mary Agnes McQuinn in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Arts
description: angel wearing a breastplate and a helmet with a lion at the top and three feathers, holding a sword aloft in his PR hand; angel also wears a shield on his PL arm, printed with, "QUIS UT DEUS"; angel wears a short skirt and a flowered sash over his PR shoulder; angel stands on a fantastic animal with a fierce dog-like head with open mouth with many teeth, lion-like body, thick tail and bat-like wings; silver figures, gilt base
title: The Archangel Saint Michael in Triumph
